li.label: nudist
li.description: NAME enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. HECAP can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.

li.label: bloodlust
li.description: NAME gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. HECAP is twice as likely to start a social fight.

li.label: kind
li.description: NAME is a nice person. HECAP has a tendency to brighten everyone else's day and never insults others.

li.label: psychopath
li.description: NAME has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother HIM at all. HECAP doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects HIM. HECAP also feels no mood boost from socializing.

li.label: cannibal
li.description: NAME was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, HE tried it... and HE liked it.

li.label: abrasive
li.description: NAME always says exactly what's on HIS mind, especially if it's bugging HIM. That tends to rub people the wrong way.

li.label: too smart
li.description: NAME is too smart for HIS own good. HECAP learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.

li.label: brawler
li.description: NAME likes to fight up close and personal. HISCAP accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but HE'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.

li.label: masochist
li.description: For NAME, there's something exciting about getting hurt. HECAP doesn't know why, HE's just wired differently.

li.label: prosthophile
li.description: NAME feels limited in HIS feeble human body. HECAP often dreams of going bionic.

li.label: prosthophobe
li.description: NAME believes the human body is limited for a reason. To HIM, bionic body parts are unethical.

li.label: green thumb
li.description: NAME has a passion for gardening. HECAP gets a mood bonus for every plant HE sows.

li.label: night owl
li.description: NAME likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.\n\nHECAP gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

li.label: greedy
li.description: NAME needs a really impressive bedroom. HECAP gets a mood loss if HE doesn't get what HE wants.

li.label: jealous
li.description: For NAME, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. HECAP gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.

li.label: ascetic
li.description: NAME prefers to live in asceticism. HECAP will be put in a poor mood if HE has a bedroom that's too impressive. HECAP also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw - and raw food won't bother HIM a bit.

li.label: gay
li.description: NAME is romantically attracted to people of HIS own gender.

li.label: misandrist
li.description: NAME really dislikes and distrusts men.

li.label: misogynist
li.description: NAME really dislikes and distrusts women.

li.label: annoying voice
li.description: NAME's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and HE tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike HIM.

li.label: creepy breathing
li.description: NAME breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.

li.label: pyromaniac
li.description: NAME loves fire. HECAP will occasionaly start fires and will never extinguish them.

li.label: wimp
li.description: NAME is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize HIM.
